mapper.sql: select doa.id, doa.assessment_uuid, doa.assessmentYear_uuid, doa.party_org_id, doa.assessment_result, doa.org_assessment_status, doa.assessment_rank,doa.assessment_self_score,doa.assessment_score,doa.assessment_score_ratio, doa.performance_appraisal_status,doa.performance_appraisal_score,doa.performance_appraisal_score_ratio, doa.add_subtract_score,doa.score,doa.del_flag, doa.create_by, doa.create_time, doa.update_by, doa.update_time from dj_org_assessment doa
mapper.select: SELECT dos.*,temp.rank_num FROM ( SELECT @curRank := IF ( @prevRank = A.score, @curRank, @incRank ) AS rank_num, @incRank := @incRank + 1 AS temp_rank, @prevRank := A.score AS total, A.* FROM ( SELECT tm.id AS id, (case when tm.score is null then 0 else tm.score end ) AS score FROM dj_org_assessment tm WHERE tm.assessmentYear_uuid = #{assessmentyearUuid} ORDER BY tm.score DESC ) A, ( SELECT @curRank := 0, @prevRank := NULL, @incRank := 1 ) B ) temp LEFT JOIN dj_org_assessment dos on dos.id = temp.id
mapper.insert:
insert into dj_org_assessment
assessment_uuid, assessmentYear_uuid, party_org_id, assessment_result, org_assessment_status, assessment_rank, assessment_self_score, assessment_score, assessment_score_ratio, performance_appraisal_status, add_subtract_score, performance_appraisal_score, performance_appraisal_score_ratio, score, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,
#{assessmentUuid}, #{assessmentyearUuid}, #{partyOrgId}, #{assessmentResult}, #{orgAssessmentStatus}, #{assessment_rank}, #{assessmentSelfScore}, #{assessmentScore}, #{assessmentScoreRatio}, #{performanceAppraisalStatus}, #{addSubtractScore}, #{performanceAppraisalScore}, #{performanceAppraisalScoreRatio}, #{score}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime},
mapper.delete:
delete from dj_org_assessment where id in
#{id}
